org.gvsig.raster.swing.gcanvas

Interface GCanvas

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGCanvas

    public interface GCanvas
extends MouseListener, MouseMotionListener
    Canvas where graphic elements are painted
